title: Bakugan Battle Arena with Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid, Customizable, Spinning Action Figure and Playset, Kids Toys for Boys and Girls 6 and up
descriptions:
Unleash epic Bakugan battles at home with the Bakugan Battle Arena featuring an exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid! Designed for kids 6 and up, this deluxe, customizable playset turns every match into a high-energy showdown. Launch powerful spins with the XL rip cord, watch Dragonoid transform on Gate Cards, and master precision strikes using the included Sparring Totems.

Why they’ll love it:
- Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid: Spin to win with a premium, rip-cord–powered Bakugan you can’t get anywhere else.
- Customizable Deluxe Arena: Set your flags, place Sparring Totems, and create your ultimate battle layout.
- Built-in Phone Holder: Keep strategy videos, stat tracking, or the Roblox tie-in right in view while you play.
- Collect, Link, and Upgrade: Use the multi-part ball linking system to customize your Bakugan and expand with training sets (sold separately).
- Transforming Action: Roll onto Gate Cards for dramatic, automatic transformations and nonstop excitement.
- Ready-to-Play Set: Includes 1 Deluxe Arena, 1 Special Attack Bakugan, 2 Clan Flags, 3 Sparring Totems, 1 Character Card, 1 Special Attack Card, 2 Gate Cards, 1 XL Rip Cord, and 1 Bakugan Token.
- Play Beyond the Board: Includes a special code compatible with Roblox for bonus online fun.

Official Bakugan product with the Spin Master Care Commitment for peace of mind. Perfect for boys and girls who love action figures, strategy, and collectible battling toys—start your collection, customize your team, and dominate the arena with Special Attack Dragonoid. Game on.
